post.title: PlayAsia‚Äôs Obake PAM Is the EN Voice for Azure Striker Gunvolt 3‚Äôs Lola
post.content:
If she's not doing her CEO duties, PlayAsia's CEOTuber Obake PAM does other roles. This time, it was announced that she is the English voice of Lola from INTI Creatives' Azure Striker Gunvolt 3.

OK I CAN SHARE NOW! I had the amazing opportunity to provide the English voice of Lola in Azure Striker #gunvolt 3 by @IntiCreatesEN !! ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏èüò≠üôè It‚Äôs been an absolute honor!!!

I will be streaming it in 4 hours to celebrate!! ‚ú®

Waiting room:https://t.co/c0mke0bbv3 pic.twitter.com/YHGgeCaA6a

— üî¥LIVEüî¥ Obake PAM Ch. („Å£‚óî‚ó°‚óî)„Å£ ‚ô• CEOtuber üì¶ (@obakepam) July 28, 2022

Following the announcement, she celebrated with a 4-hour playthrough stream.

Azure Striker Gunvolt 3 is a 2D action game available on Nintendo Switch (physical and digital), Xbox One, Xbox Series X|S and Steam. Orders of the latest game made at play-asia.com include a bonus limited edition PAM card.

post.description: If she's not doing her CEO duties, PlayAsia's CEOTuber Obake PAM does other roles. This time, it was announced that she is the English voice of Lola from INTI Creatives' Azure Striker Gunvolt 3.

node.description: Murasaki Shion from Hololive has released a new single titled 'Chandelier'. The track is produced and written by popular Vocaloid producer Kanaria.
